effect.Name: Genshin Impact Natlan Outline (Background)
effect.description: This effect is an attempt to recreate the outline of playable characters from Genshin Impact, specifically from Natlan.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Genshin Impact Natlan Outline (Background) Shader | 1.0 (31.08.2025) */
parameter.description: This effect is an attempt to recreate the outline of playable characters from Genshin Impact, specifically from Natlan.

parameter.name: ( Position )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for changing the position in the noise.

parameter.name: Position X
parameter.description: A variable that determines the position of the noise in the X axis.

parameter.name: Position Y
parameter.description: A variable that determines the position of the noise in the Y axis.

parameter.name: ( Scale )
parameter.description: Here are the variables that determine the scale and offset of the noise.

parameter.name: Scale
parameter.description: This variable determines the overall scale of the noise (in X and Y axes).

parameter.name: Scale X
parameter.description: This variable determines the scale of the noise in the X axis.

parameter.name: Scale Y
parameter.description: This variable determines the scale of the noise in the X axis.

parameter.name: ( Rendering Options )
parameter.description: Here are the options for how the texture should be rendered.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Texture Alpha
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for visiblity texutre.

parameter.name: Outline Offset
parameter.description: This variable determines the size of the outline offset.

parameter.name: Outline Offset Distortion
parameter.description: This variable defines the outline offset depending on the pattern.

parameter.name: Seed
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the randomness of the pattern, depending on the seed.

parameter.name: Color Light
parameter.description: Determines what color should be used when brightness is at its highest.

parameter.name: Color
parameter.description: Determines what color should be used when lightness is at mid.

parameter.name: Color Shadow
parameter.description: Determines what color should be used when lightness is at its lowest.

parameter.name: ( Compatibility )
parameter.description: Here you will find options that have changed, but you can still achieve the previous effect.

parameter.name: Is Fusion Version Older Than 296?
parameter.description: (Only applies to Android and iOS!) This variable determines whether to use the newer background formatting. In Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for build 295.10 and earlier, the background texture was flipped along the Y axis, but this was changed in build 296.1. Check this option if you are using an older build!
